messages.content: Plan daily aerobic exercise and training games to keep mind and body satisfied. Brush the double coat several times weekly and manage seasonal shedding. Maintain a healthy weight to support joints. Use ethical sources and health screening. Prioritize gentle, consistent training and enrichment.

Provide daily mental work (training, scent games) and steady exercise. Keep to a regular grooming schedule for the curly coat to prevent mats. Socialize kindly and use reward-based training. Choose ethical breeders or reputable rescues and discuss common health screenings with your vet.

Expect high daily activity and job-like training to channel drive. Use puzzle feeders, shaping games, and canine sports. Brush regularly to manage the double coat. Watch weight and joints. Ensure secure fencing and structured decompression after intense work to support a balanced nervous system.
